title: "Retro Space Station"
content:
# Retro Space Station

Welcome to Retro Space Station, your go-to destination for all things retro and futuristic! Our website is dedicated to bringing you the latest news, reviews, and insights into the world of vintage gaming, sci-fi movies, and space exploration.

With our pixel art depiction of a space station as our main wallpaper, we aim to transport you back in time to the golden age of gaming and science fiction. Our content covers a wide range of topics, from classic games like Space Invaders and Pac-Man to modern indie titles that pay homage to the retro era.

Whether you're a seasoned gamer, a sci-fi enthusiast, or just someone who appreciates the aesthetics of the past, Retro Space Station has something for you. So come aboard and join us on a journey through time and space!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A pixel art depiction of a space station, with blocky shapes and limited colors that create a retro and futuristic feel."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
